title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4046.3 - Workers' compensation insurance carrier
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4046.3 - Workers' compensation insurance carrier

State Regulations

In the event that JICF has failed to submit, by the
submission deadline, a subsequent-year plan, the commission shall order JICF to
accept the offer of an insurance carrier to provide workers' compensation
insurance, as required by section 221 of the Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law and the Workers' Compensation Law, to JICF for the subsequent
year, as selected by the commission in the commission's sole and absolute
discretion, and JICF shall bind such coverage. Such policy shall remain in
effect unless superseded by a plan submitted by the JICF and approved by the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4046.3

Adopted

New

York State Register March 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 11, eff. 3/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
